term: How does this proposal anticipate the Civil War?
content:
the seeds of the civil war were planted with the enactment of this third hamilton bill
the south was never forced to diversify their economy
they were surviving on being farmers and agricultural and utilizing slavery as free labor

when the civil war hits, slaves are rebelling and being freed, and since their economy was never diversified ie they had only farming, their farming became ruined since there were no more slaves and no free labor and no one to work their only piece of economy
ie they one tricked farming and farming was destroyed so their economy destroyed as well
